title: Ep 341 | Why Si Thinks Jase Is a Cheater & Why the Devil Gets WAY Too Much Credit
description:
Si thinks Jase must be the luckiest card player in the world. Zach makes the mistake of wrestling with Jay Stone. Jase recalls how he responded when he was surrounded by sin in Las Vegas. Phil talks about the way the devil influences decisions. Jase and Zach talk about cellphones and temptation. And Phil and Zach discuss why it doesn’t matter what we think about what other people do.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
